Class CalendarImpl

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.simulation.CalendarImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Calendar, java.io.Serializable
public class CalendarImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Calendar, java.io.Serializable

Simulation calendar. For now implemented as a public singleton.

Author:
pavel

instance

getInstance

public static CalendarImpl getInstance()
Returns the single instance of the calendar, or null if it does not exist yet

emptyInstance

public static void emptyInstance()
Empty whole the Calendar before the XML load. We just drop the singleton and create a new one.

setInstance

public static void setInstance(CalendarImpl instance)
Sets the static reference to the singleton. This method should be called only in case of loading the singleton object from the serialized stream

Parameters:
instance - Reference to the new instance

plan

Hook plan(long time)
Plans Hook signaling after specified period of time. This method should be used only by CalendarPlanner, which presents it to others.

Parameters:
time - period of time in milliseconds
Returns:
Hook to be signaled

replan

void replan(Hook hook,
            long time,
            boolean clear)
Replans Hook to signal after specified period of time. This method should be used only by CalendarPlanner, which presents it to others.

Parameters:
hook - Hook to be replanned, it must be a hook created by plan() method of CalendarPlanner, or the ClassCast exception will be thrown.
time - period of time in milliseconds
clear - Determines whether the hook should be cleared before it's usage. If set to false, the hook will be only replanned, all listeners remaining. If set to true, the hook will be cleared to reuse the structure as a new hook.

cancelHook

public void cancelHook(Hook hook)
                throws HookNotPlannedException
Cancels the hook planned by plan() method. Notifies all listeners about the hook cancel and deletes the hook. If the canceled hook was not planned by plan() method, the HookNotPlannedException will be thrown. This method should be used only by CalendarPlanner, which presents it to others.

Parameters:
hook - Hook to cancel
Throws:
HookNotPlannedException

updateWorld

public void updateWorld()
Updates all part of the world that need to be updated after all commits were done in the current simulation milisecond.

step

public boolean step(long time)
             throws EmptyCalendarException
Run the simulation for given period of simulation time. The Simulation lock of the Scheduler is locked for every time step evaluation. This prevents other threads from accessing the simulation when it is being modified.

Specified by:
step in interface Calendar
Parameters:
time - period of time in milliseconds
Returns:
true iff something was simulated in the given time
Throws:
EmptyCalendarException

step

public void step()
          throws EmptyCalendarException
Run the simulation to the nearest event. All events in this simulation time will be evaluated.

Specified by:
step in interface Calendar
Throws:
EmptyCalendarException

getSimulationTime

public long getSimulationTime()
Getter for the simulation time

getRoundHook

public Hook getRoundHook(CalendarPlanner.RoundHookPosition pos)

getGuiInfo

public java.util.List<GuiCalendar.EventInfo> getGuiInfo()
This method is to be called from the gui thread with the simulation lock held only.

Returns:
List of prefabricated information about calendar events.

breakSimulation

public void breakSimulation()
Breaks the simulation at the end of the current simulation moment. If the simulation is not computed in this moment, has no effect. Can be called from another thread.
